name: part_001
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ3D】尾丸ポルカ3Dお披露目するか！ポルカおるよ！【ホロライブ】 [GnW76d1A3YQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka showcases her 3D model, focusing on her tail, hair, and posing under stage lights.
Polka interacts with the audience, reading comments and performing fanservice requests.
A large group of 'Zain-kun' (fan representations) appear on stage, and Polka plays and hides among them.
Polka introduces the details of her custom 3D circus tent stage, including the seating and trapeze.

subtitles.original: しっぽ見る？あともうちょっと。
subtitles.english: Want to see my tail? Just a bit more.

subtitles.original: あの、ここでしか見られへん。
subtitles.english: Um, you can only see it here.

subtitles.original: えい、えい、えい、えい、えい、えい、えい、えい、えい、えい、えい。
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 尾丸ポルカの「お」はね、お尻が丸いから尾丸なんだよ。
subtitles.english: The "O" in Omaru Polka stands for "round butt," that's why it's Omaru.

subtitles.original: あの、寝る時丸まるんすわ。
subtitles.english: Um, I curl up when I sleep.

subtitles.original: こう、寝る時、こう丸まって...ギュッてなるから、こう、尾丸なわけ。
subtitles.english: Like, when I sleep, I curl up like this... and get all compact, so that's why it's Omaru.

subtitles.original: え？何？アホ毛？
subtitles.english: Eh? What? My hair flick?

subtitles.original: 回んないよ。回んな、すま。
subtitles.english: It doesn't spin. It won't spin, sorry.

subtitles.original: ちょっと今回の技術は足りんかった、私の。私がね、これもっと回せるようになったら...
subtitles.english: My skills weren't quite enough this time. If I get better at spinning this...

subtitles.original: 空も飛べるかもしれん。
subtitles.english: I might even be able to fly.

subtitles.original: もしかしたら、ホログラがやってくれるかもしれない。
subtitles.english: Maybe Hologra will do it for me.

subtitles.original: みんな、お問い合わせしよう。
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's send in a request.

subtitles.original: よし、これでいいだろ。
subtitles.english: Alright, this should be fine.

subtitles.original: え、これでよかった？
subtitles.english: Wait, was this okay?

subtitles.original: あ、回ってほしかった？
subtitles.english: Ah, did you want me to spin?

subtitles.original: ポルカが回るよ、じゃあ。ほら、これでいいだろ、ほら、私が回るからほら！
subtitles.english: Then Polka will spin! Here, this is what you wanted, right? Look, I'm spinning!

subtitles.original: ほら、これで満足か？ほら。
subtitles.english: See? Are you satisfied now? Look.

subtitles.original: よし、いいぞ。いいぞ。回ってる？
subtitles.english: Alright, nice. Nice. Am I spinning?

subtitles.original: どう？回ってる？あんま？
subtitles.english: How is it? Am I spinning? Not really?

subtitles.original: あんまかな？
subtitles.english: Not really, I guess?

subtitles.original: え？じゃあ、え、どうしよう。
subtitles.english: Eh? Then, um, what should I do?

subtitles.original: あ、なんかこれ、アーティストやん。
subtitles.english: Ah, this is kind of like an artist.

subtitles.original: あ、なんかすごいアーティストっぽくなってる今。
subtitles.english: Ah, I look like a total artist right now.

subtitles.original: おお...
subtitles.english: Ooh...

subtitles.original: え、何これ、パリコレ？
subtitles.english: Wait, what is this, Paris Fashion Week?

subtitles.original: すごくない？ホロコレ？出られる？
subtitles.english: Isn't it amazing? HoloColle? Can I be in it?

subtitles.original: 魅惑なボディが、魅惑的な尾丸ポルカ。
subtitles.english: The enchanting Omaru Polka with an enchanting body.

subtitles.original: 魅惑のボディが本当に魅惑的です。
subtitles.english: This enchanting body really is enchanting.

subtitles.original: え、こんなんで、酔っちゃう、ごめん、酔っちゃう。
subtitles.english: Eh, with just this, you'll get drunk? Sorry, you'll get drunk.

subtitles.original: それは耐性がなさすぎだろ。
subtitles.english: You have way too little tolerance for that.

subtitles.original: おい、おい、ビール買い！ビール買い！
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, buy some beer! Buy some beer!

subtitles.original: おい。
subtitles.english: Hey.

subtitles.original: あれ？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: あ、あの、ここです。ここです、ここですよ。
subtitles.english: Ah, um, over here. Over here, I'm over here.

subtitles.original: あ、あ、あ...はははは！
subtitles.english: Ah, ah, ah... Hahaha!

subtitles.original: ただいま。
subtitles.english: I'm back.

subtitles.original: ステージいいでしょ。すごくない？
subtitles.english: The stage is great, right? Isn't it amazing?

subtitles.original: いいでしょ。あれ、おかえり。
subtitles.english: It's nice, right? Oh, welcome back.

subtitles.original: ヤッホー。どう？
subtitles.english: Yahoo! How is it?

subtitles.original: えー、コメント、なんか見たいところある？
subtitles.english: Hmm, comments, is there anything you want to see?

subtitles.original: ふふふ、ほかのサーカスの雰囲気がすごい、え。
subtitles.english: Hehehe, the atmosphere of the other circus is amazing... eh.

subtitles.original: あとで見せたげるからちょっと待ってな。
subtitles.english: I'll show you later, so just wait a bit.

subtitles.original: ウインク、バチコン！うりゃい！
subtitles.english: Wink, bam! Take that!

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: 鎖骨？
subtitles.english: Collarbone?

subtitles.original: え、なんかマニアックじゃない、それ。
subtitles.english: Eh, isn't that a bit of a niche request?

subtitles.original: 見えるじゃん、これ、見えるでしょ、別に。
subtitles.english: You can see it, look, you can see it anyway.

subtitles.original: え？え？
subtitles.english: Eh? Eh?

subtitles.original: もっと、見せて...
subtitles.english: Show us more...

subtitles.original: 後ろ？え？
subtitles.english: The back? Eh?

subtitles.original: なんか...え？な...
subtitles.english: Something... eh? Wha...

subtitles.original: 普通にこれ恥ずかしいな。あ、ちょっと...
subtitles.english: This is actually kind of embarrassing. Ah, wait a second...

subtitles.original: いるよ、なんかいる、わあ！
subtitles.english: There's something here, something's here, waah!

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: お前たち...
subtitles.english: You guys...

subtitles.original: お前たち、まさか...
subtitles.english: You guys, don't tell me...

subtitles.original: あ、来てくれたんか、ポルカのために。微動だにせんけどお前ら。
subtitles.english: Ah, you came for me, for Polka. Even though you aren't moving an inch.

subtitles.original: 来てくれたんか。うちのお丸座員よ。
subtitles.english: So you came. My Omaru-Zain.

subtitles.original: マジこいつら...
subtitles.english: Seriously, these guys...

subtitles.original: あの、生きてる？生きてんのかなこいつら。え？
subtitles.english: Um, are you alive? Are these guys alive? Eh?

subtitles.original: ほら、ほら、ほら...
subtitles.english: Look, look, look...

subtitles.original: さて、ポルカどこにいるでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Now then, where is Polka?

subtitles.original: 尾丸ポルカどこにいるでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Where is Omaru Polka?

subtitles.original: あ、わかるわこれ。
subtitles.english: Ah, I can tell.

subtitles.original: ははははは！
subtitles.english: Hahahahaha!

subtitles.original: 離さんといて。
subtitles.english: Don't leave me.

subtitles.original: 尾丸ポルカどこにいるでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Where is Omaru Polka?

subtitles.original: おるな。わかるな、これ。
subtitles.english: There she is. I can tell.

subtitles.original: え、すごい座員くん可愛いね。これ、なんか...
subtitles.english: Eh, the Zain-kuns are so cute. This, somehow...

subtitles.original: ちょっと足蹴にしちゃってる、足蹴に...ごめん、ごめん！踏んでない、踏んでない！
subtitles.english: I'm kind of kicking them, kicking... Sorry, sorry! I'm not stepping on you, I'm not!

subtitles.original: 違う、違う、踏んでない、踏んでない！
subtitles.english: No, no, I'm not stepping on you!

subtitles.original: 埋まった。
subtitles.english: I'm buried.

subtitles.original: 咲いた。
subtitles.english: I bloomed.

subtitles.original: そっか。じゃあお前らよく来てくれた。
subtitles.english: I see. Well, you guys did well to come.

subtitles.original: ま、一応、これから始まるから、お前らよく見ておけ。
subtitles.english: Well, for now, things are about to start, so you guys watch closely.

subtitles.original: じゃ、解散。散れ、散れ！
subtitles.english: Now then, dismissed. Scram, scram!

subtitles.original: はははは！そんな解散の仕方、はははは！びっくりした。
subtitles.english: Hahaha! What a way to dismiss them, hahaha! That surprised me.

subtitles.original: なんかサプライズ出演かな？サプライズ解散に笑っちゃった。
subtitles.english: Was that like a surprise appearance? The surprise dismissal made me laugh.

subtitles.original: いい絵面よかったね。
subtitles.english: That was a good shot.

subtitles.original: まあ、というわけでね、ちょうど...まあ先日、フニフニフニャフニャでもね...
subtitles.english: Well, anyway, just... well, the other day, even during the prep...

subtitles.original: サーカステントとか作り終えたということで。
subtitles.english: We finished building the circus tent and everything.

subtitles.original: えー、サーカステント。こちら！ようやくね、みんなもね、迎え入れられたということで。
subtitles.english: Um, the circus tent. This is it! We were finally able to welcome everyone.

subtitles.original: テント、見せたいと思います。
subtitles.english: I'd like to show you the tent.

subtitles.original: さあ、まず、これどういう感じになってるかっていうのを、ちょっと見てほしいんだけど。
subtitles.english: Now then, first, I want you to see what it's like in here.

subtitles.original: おお！
subtitles.english: Ooh!

subtitles.original: これだよ、求めてたのは。
subtitles.english: This is it, what I was looking for.

subtitles.original: あそこにブランコがあってね。
subtitles.english: There's a trapeze over there.

subtitles.original: あそこにね、あのね、登るんよ。
subtitles.english: I'm going to, you know, climb up there.
